text: Aleksander Kwaśniewski (; born 15 November 1954) is a Polish politician. He served as President for two terms (1995-2000 and 2000-2005). He was born in Białogard in Northwest Poland. Before became a politician, he was a journalist. Before became president, he was minister and deputy to the Sejm. In the late 1980s, he participated in the Polish Round Table Agreement. In 1995 election, he won in the second round, but five years later he won in the first round. == Other websites == * Official web page Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Poland
title: Aleksander Kwasniewski
